DOC.brief_summary: At Bispebjerg Hospital we have introduced an Early Warning Score based triage system , called Bispebjerg Early Warning Score (BEWS), in order to identify critically ill patient on arrival at the emergency department. The purpose of this study is to validate our triage system.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of an Early Warning Score Based Triage System in the Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: "Red" patient Seen in our emergency department between 1. april 2009 and 30. september 2009
